scripts.challenge: node run.js data/challenge.bin data/challenge-solution.txt 2> logs/challenge-debug.txt | tee logs/challenge-output.txt
scripts.test: node run.js data/test.bin                                  2> logs/test-debug.txt      | tee logs/test-output.txt
scripts.thanks: node run.js data/thanks.bin                                2> logs/thanks-debug.txt    | tee logs/thanks-output.txt
